org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos

Class StreamProcessProviderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos.StreamDataProviderFactory<IStreamProcessModule<?>>
      • org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos.StreamProcessProviderFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventListener, ISOSDataProviderFactory

    public class StreamProcessProviderFactory
extends StreamDataProviderFactory<IStreamProcessModule<?>>
implements ISOSDataProviderFactory, IEventListener

    Factory for stream processing data providers.
    Most of the logic is inherited from StreamDataProviderFactory.

    Since:
    Feb 28, 2015
    Author:
    Alex Robin
